snippet: Adrian Beltre hits for power and average, but the way he plays third base makes him one of the most underappreciated performers in baseball.
abstract: Texas Rangers third baseman Adrian Beltre hits for power and average, but the way he plays his position makes him one of the most underappreciated performers in baseball.
lead_paragraph: Adrian Beltre hits for power and average, but the way he plays third base makes him one of the most underappreciated performers in baseball.

headline.seo: Rangers’ Adrian Beltre Plays Third Base Like No One Else
headline.main: At Third for Texas, Unorthodox Excellence
headline.print_headline: At Third for Texas, Unorthodox Excellence
